scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary, crowned and robed in blue, cradling the Christ Child, who is dressed in a pink garment. They are set against a backdrop of golden drapery, suggesting a regal or divine setting. Above them, a band of blue with stylized faces, possibly representing angels or a heavenly host, is visible. The figures are rendered with bold outlines and flat colors, characteristic of medieval manuscript illumination.
